person.content:

Since it is a part of the name of a football team, it can be identified as a "Person" entity representing the football team.

3. Carl: This is most likely a reference to Carl Zeiss-Stadion, which is the home stadium of Karlsruhe SC. It is not a person, but it can be mentioned for context.

4. 44th : This is likely a reference to the 44th team or division in a football league. Since it is a part of the name of an opposing team, it can be identified as a "Person" entity representing the opposing football team.

5. Dundee: This is a city in Scotland. However, in the given context, it is being used as the name of a football team, specifically Dundee FC. So, it can be identified as a "Person" entity representing the football team.

6. 69th : This is likely a reference to the 69th team or division in a football league. Since it is a part of the name of an opposing team, it can be identified as a "Person" entity representing the opposing football team.

7. Freiburg: This is a city in Germany. However, in the given context, it is being used as the name of a football team, specifically SC Freiburg. So, it can be identified as a "Person" entity representing the football team.

8. 0 : This is a number and not a person. It represents the number of goals scored by Freiburg in the match.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.
